forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the morning. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 20F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will give way to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low 26F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low around 0C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 33F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will taper to showers of rain and wet snow during the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with a mix of light rain and snow later in the day. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
